name: Championship Manager: Season 01/02
description:
DESCRIPTION:
Championship Manager: Season 01 - 02 is the last season update from the record breaking and award winning soccer simulation Championship Manager 3 engine. Championship Manager: Season 01 - 02 is also the 10th Anniversary edition of a franchise that now boasts over 2 million sales worldwide.

Championship Manager has been fully updated for the 2001/2002 season. New levels of realism has been achieved with the ability to play ¡¥Fog of War¡¦ style which presents only the information that a manager would realistically know about.

GAME FEATURES:
- Improved Data Editor, allowing you to change and modify the stats used in the game. Keep your team squads up to date or even add yourself to the game
- The manager can now play the game 'Fog of War' style: only the stats and players a manager would realistically know about are shown
- New ability to compare two players at a glance
- There is now the ability for managers to make notes on players in the game, approach governing bodies to appeal against bans imposed on their players, issue the board with ultimatums and send players away for surgery to repair recurring injuries
- Detailed profiles and histories for over 100,000 players, managers and coaches
- Club fines: V the FA will now fine a club if they have a bad disciplinary record or if their players are involved in a brawl
- Enhanced media involvement, more messages, feedback, and variety from the press than ever before
26 concurrent leagues will be playable
